description: While processing a WMI_APFIND event in all Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel (Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android) before security patch level 2018-07-05, a buffer over-read and information leak can potentially occur.

product.name: Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel
